Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at St. Joseph Hotel in London (Kensington), you'll be convenient to Olympia Conference and Exhibition Centre and Imperial College London. This hotel is close to Royal Albert Hall and Harrods.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 40 guestrooms. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) is available to keep you connected. Conveniences include safes, and both cribs/infant beds (surcharge) and rollaway/extra beds are available on request.

Dining
A complimentary continental breakfast is served daily.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk and multilingual staff.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
A complimentary continental breakfast is served daily.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.


Make yourself at home in one of the 40 guestrooms. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) is available to keep you connected. Conveniences include safes, and both cribs/infant beds (surcharge) and rollaway/extra beds are available on request.

With a stay at St. Joseph Hotel in London (Kensington), you'll be convenient to Olympia Conference and Exhibition Centre and Imperial College London. This hotel is close to Royal Albert Hall and Harrods.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Olympia Conference and Exhibition Centre - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Kensington Roof Gardens - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Holland Park - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Stamford Bridge Stadium - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Kensington Palace - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
London Natural History Museum - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Imperial College London - 1.5 km / 1 mi
Royal Albert Hall - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Albert Memorial - 1.7 km / 1 mi
London Science Museum - 1.7 km / 1 mi
Broadway Shopping Centre - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Victoria and Albert Museum - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Hammersmith Apollo - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Brompton Oratory - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Kensington Gardens - 2 km / 1.2 mi

The nearest airports are:
London (LCY-London City) - 17.1 km / 10.7 mi
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 17.7 km / 11 mi

The preferred airport for St. Joseph Hotel is London (LHR-Heathrow).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
